page.title: 16Owston Grange Farm Equipment
page.content: The farmer has a tractor which he uses to pull things like trailers and ploughs.He has a haycutter.A haycutter is used for cutting hay,straw and wheat.The farmer has a plough.He uses the plough to make furrows in the soil for the grain to go in.He uses a cultivator for turning over the soil so it is not too wet or too dry.The farmer also has a bailer. A bailer is used for bailing straw.He uses fertiliser to help the crops grow.Also the farmer owns a sprayer to spray the crops.He uses a grinder to grind the wheat and an electric saw to cut the trees for fire wood.He owns a hay turner as well.
